烂完了

15 dollars for missions that were announced to be free years ago. A 10 dollar battle pass that is practically a necessity when new heroes release. Overpriced skins that we would've received for free in the form of lootboxes on account level up. And I'm pretty sure OW is still an unbalanced cluster fuck that just doesn't feel fun to play.
How do you keep missing the mark when people are obviously outraged by your shitty practices???

*Very fun, you already know it's good if it's made by Blizzard. They always listen to the players and their own employees, creating fun and safe environments for both.

*Very fair prices too, the skins are so cheap.

*Can't wait for the pve-mode to launch.

暴雪！我真的好喜欢你啊。为了你，我要背古诗！
        诗经·彼阳
彼阳若至，初升东曦。
绯雾飒蔽，似幕绡绸。
彼阳篝碧，雾霈涧滁。
赤石冬溪，似玛瑙潭。
彼阳晚意，暖梦似乐。
寐游浮沐，若雉飞舞。

고양이



옛날에 나는 고양이 한 마리를 키웠는데, 나는 10위안이 있었는데, 8위안으로 그에게 먹을 것을 사주고, 자주 목욕을 시켰는데, 그것도 매우 끈적거렸다.



나중에 나는 그것을 데리고 놀러 나갔는데, 행인들은 그것이 매우 귀엽다고 느꼈다. 그들은 그것에게 고양이 사료, 소시지를 먹였다. 나는 매우 불쾌했다. 왜냐하면 그것은 나의 것이기 때문이다.나는 그것을 집으로 안고 싶었지만, 그것은 나를 벗어났고, 그것을 맛있는 사람에게 야옹야옹, 나는 몇 번 안아도 그는 나를 따라가지 않고, 나를 긁어 상처를 입혔고, 그래서 나는 몸을 돌려 갔다......



나중에 우연히 길에서 그것을 만났는데 몸이 지저분했다.길사람들은 맛있는 것만 주고 놀아줄 뿐 집에 데려가 목욕시키지는 않는다.날 보자마자 집에 따라오더니 문 밖에 가뒀더니 문 밖에서 야옹야옹 울고 있어 괴롭고

하지만 더 이상 원하지 않을 거야



cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore


게임이 더 이상 순수하지 않을 때, 게임 회사가 오로지 돈만을 생각할 때, 게이머의 정서와 사랑은 잿더미가 될 것이다。When the game is no longer pure, when the game company is only focused on money, the feelings and affection of players will be reduced to ashes

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

It started as an amazing game with a great future, it ended as an example of how greed will destroy a game. I bought three copies of overwatch and when overwatch 2 came out, I lost all of my progress on all overwatch accounts. On top of that, they made it free to play and locked all the characters I would normally get in the original game. I can't see any of my original competitive progress that I spent hours grinding for. Currency was practically reset. It's literally made a DLC for overwatch that removed content and called it a sequel. Pitiful, disgusting, company. Don't even waste your time.

I use to love Overwatch very much and used play the game the whole day but Overwatch 2 has to be the most garbage game ever made and doesn't deserve to be called a sequel. It's such a huge downgrade from what Overwatch 1 used to be and 5v5 has to be the worst changes ever made to the game, and adding battlepass, locking characters behind battlepass, removing features, overcharging old and free character skins, etc are the worst things to happen to this game.

The matchmaking in this game is also one of the worst on the entire planet earth, I have never seen anything like it. There is no balance whatsoever in this game. You are forced to lose on a 10 - 15+ losing streak and placed in matches with brain dead players where your teammates plays like who just started playing the game with 0 or less than 10 kills in ranked while the enemy teams have above 20-30+ kills even in Plat and Diamond matches. And when it's your turn to win, you are placed on a win streak where your team carries you even if you go afk or with minimal effort, and the cycle continues. You either stomp the enemy team or get stomped most of the matches. This has got to be the most stupid shit in this game. I wanted to take ranked seriously but it's not worth it.

I highly don't recommend this piece of shit of a game.

OW1 > OW2
(1500+ lvl of OW1)

你说的对 但是《守望先锋归来》是由动视暴雪自主研发的一款全新第一人称射击游戏。我现在每玩一周守望先锋都能赚60金币，每个月差不多240金币的收入，也就是现实生活中每个月7.2元的收入水平，换算过来31周，也就是7个月，我就可以买一个守望先锋的普通金皮，虽然守望先锋1只要1000金币升级还给箱子可以有几率开出，但是已经超越了中国绝大多数人(包括你)的水平，这便是守望先锋给我的骄傲的资本。ow没有义务给你你想得到的东西，他只是一款游戏,给你带来快乐，还要依着你的小脾气?他就算不让你玩，他也没有不对的地方，记住ow没欠你,也许我们大家还欠暴雪一句谢谢，暴雪花费大量精力和金钱制作的ow2，最后免费开放给玩家，你们居然还不知足，记住是我们选择的ow,不是ow选择的我们，觉得不好可以退游，暴雪、ow不欠我们,但是我们欠暴雪、ow一句谢谢，以及制作组两年多幸苦制作，而不是在这口诛笔伐问官方要补偿，如果你觉得我说的不对，一定是不懂2016夏天的含金量
